#line 1 "C:/Users/conno/Desktop/The-Forge/Examples_3/Unit_Tests/src/10_PixelProjectedReflections/Shaders/D3D12/skybox.vert"
#line 27 "C:/Users/conno/Desktop/The-Forge/Examples_3/Unit_Tests/src/10_PixelProjectedReflections/Shaders/D3D12/skybox.vert"
cbuffer uniformBlock : register(b0,  space1 )
{
	float4x4 projView;
	float3 camPos;
}

struct VSInput
{
	float4 Position : POSITION;
};

struct VSOutput
{
	float4 Position : SV_POSITION;
	float3 pos : POSITION;
};

VSOutput main(VSInput input)
{
    VSOutput result;
    result.Position = mul(projView, input.Position);
	result.Position = result.Position.xyww;

	result.pos = input.Position;

    return result;
}
